255:1: rājalakṣmīrapi śreyomārgaṃ nāvṛṇoti saṃvignamānasānāmiti saṃvegaparicayaḥ kāryaḥ|
255:3: bodhisattvabhūtaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavān vyādhijarāmaraṇapriyaviprayogādivyasanaśatopanipātaṃ duḥkhitamanāthamatrāṇamapariṇāyakaṃ lokamavekṣya karuṇayā samutsāhyamānastatparitrāṇavyavasitamatiratisādhusvabhāvastattatsaṃpādayamāno vimukhasyāsaṃstutasyāpi ca lokasya hitaṃ sukhaviśeṣa ca kadācidanyatamasmin rājakule prajānurāgasaumukhyādaskhalitābhivṛddhyā ca samṛddhyā samānatadṛptasāmantayā cābhivyajyamānamahābhāgye vinayaślāghini janma pratilebhe|
255:4: sa jāyamāna eva tadrājakulaṃ tatsamānasukhaduḥkhaṃ ca puravaraṃ parayābhyudayaśriyā samyojayāmāsa|
255:13: tena ca samayena tasya rājño jātā jātāḥ kumārā mriyante sma|
255:14: sa taṃ vidhimamānuṣakṛtamiti manyamānastasya tanayasya rakṣārthaṃ maṇikāñcanarajatabhakticitre śrīmati sarvāyase prasūtibhavane bhūtavidyāparidṛṣṭena vedavihitena ca krameṇa vihitarakṣodhnapratīkāre samucitaiśca kautukamaṅgalaiḥ kṛtasvastyayanaparigrahe jātakarmādisaṃskāravidhiṃ saṃvardhanaṃ ca kārayāmāsa|
255:15: tamapi ca mahāsattvaṃ sattvasaṃpatteḥ puṇyopacayaprabhāvātsusaṃvihitatvācca rakṣāyā nāmānuṣāḥ prasehire|
255:16: sa kālakramādavāptasaṃskārakarmā śrutābhijanācāramahadbhyo labdhavidvadyaśaḥsaṃmānanebhyaḥ praśamavinayamedhāguṇāvarjitebhyo gurubhyaḥ samadhigatānekavidyaḥ pratyahamāpūryamāṇamūrtiryauvanakāntyā nisargasiddhena ca vinayānurāgeṇa apraṃ premāspadaṃ svajanasya janasya ca babhūva|
255:21: atha sa mahāsattvaḥ puṇyaprabhāvasukhopanatairdivyakalpairanalpairapi ca viṣayairupalālyamānaḥ snehabahumānasumukhena ca pitrā viśvāsananirviśaṅkaṃ dṛśyamānaḥ kadācitsvasmin puravare pravitataramaṇīyaśobhāṃ kalakramopanatāṃ kaumudīvibhūtiṃ didṛkṣuḥ kṛtābhyanujñaḥ pitrā kāñcanamaṇirajatabhakticitrālaṃkāraṃ samucchritanānāvidharāgapracalitojjvalapatākadhvajaṃ haimabhāṇḍābhyalaṃkṛtavinītacaturaturaṃgaṃ dakṣadākṣiṇyanipuṇaśucivinītadhīrasārathiṃ citrojjvalaveṣapraharaṇāvaraṇānuyātraṃ rathavaramadhiruhya manoṅatūryasvanapuraḥsarastatpuravaramanuvicaraṃstaddarśanākṣiptahṛdayasya kautūhalalolacakṣuṣaḥ stutisabhājanāñjalipragrahapraṇāmāśīrvacanaprayogasavyāparasyotsavaramyataraveṣaracanasya paurajānapadasya samudayaśobhāmālokya labdhapraharṣāvakāśe'pi manasi kṛtasaṃvegaparicayatvātpūrvajanmasu smṛtiṃ pratilebhe|
255:24: evaṃvidhāyāṃ ca jagatpravṛttāvaho yathā nirbhayatā janānām|
255:30: taṭaiḥ samaṃ tadvinibaddhamūlān hṛtvā tarūllabdhajavaiḥ payobhiḥ|
255:31: bhavanti bhūyaḥ saritaḥ kramena śokopatāpādiva dinarūpāḥ||11||
255:32: hṛtvāpi śṛṅgāṇi mahīdharāṇāṃ vegena vṛndāni ca toyadānām|
255:33: vighūrṇya codvartya ca sāgarāmbhaḥ prayāti nāśa pavanaprabhāvaḥ||12||
255:36: kaḥ saṃprayogo na viyoganiṣṭhaḥ kāḥ saṃpado yā na vipatparaiti|
255:38: iti sa parigaṇayan mahātmā saṃvegādvyāvṛttapramodauddhavena manasā ramaṇīyeṣvapi puravaravibhūṣārthamabhiprasāriṣu lokacitreṣvaviṣajyamānabuddhiḥ krameṇa svabhavanamanuprāptamevātmānamapaśyat|
255:39: tadabhivṛddhasaṃvegaśca viṣayasukheṣvanāstho dharma ekaḥ śaraṇamiti tatpratipattiniścitamatiryathāprastāvamabhigamya rājānaṃ kṛtāñjalistapovanagamanāyānujñāmayācata-
255:42: tacchratvā priyatanayaḥ sa tasya rājā digdhena dvirada iveṣuṇābhividdhaḥ|
255:44: nivārayiṣyannatha taṃ sa rājā snehātpaṣvajya sabāṣpakaṇṭhaḥ|
255:48: athāpi kiṃcitpariśaṅkitaṃ vā mayi vyalīkaṃ samupaśrutaṃ vā|
255:49: tadbrūhi yāvadviramāmi tasmātpaśyāmi na tvātmani kiṃcidīdṛk||19||
255:53: atha kiṃ tarhi naḥ parityuaktumicchasīti cābhihitaḥ sāśrunayanena rājñā sa mahāsattvastamuvāca-mṛtyubhayāt|
255:55: yāmeva rātriṃ prathamāmupaiti garbhe nivāsaṃ naravīra lokaḥ|
255:57: nītau suyukto'pi bale sthito'pi nātyeti kaścinmaraṇaṃ jarāṃ vā|
255:60: jetuṃ kṛtā taripumekamapi tvaśaktāstanme matirbhavati dharmamabhiprapattum||23||
255:62: sārdhaṃ balairatibalasya tu mṛtyuśatrormanvādayo'pi vivaśā vaśamabhyupetāḥ||24||
255:64: mattā dvipā yudhi rathāṃśca narān dvīpāṃśca|
255:70: bhittvaiva ca śrutamanāṃsi ravaiḥ pareṣāṃ mṛtyuṃ sametya hatadarpabalāḥ svapanti||27||
255:71: doṣānurūpaṃ praṇayanti daṇḍaṃ kṛtāparādheṣu nṛpāḥ pareṣu|
255:72: mahāparādhe yadi mṛtyuśatrau na daṇḍanītipravaṇā bhavanti||28||
255:111: dṛptānapi pratinudantyasurān surendrā dṛptānapi pratinudantyasurāḥ surāṃśca|
255:112: mānādhirūḍhamatibhiḥ sumudīrṇasainyaistaiḥ saṃhatairapi tu mṛtyurajayya eva||40||
255:114: na manyunā snehaparikṣayeṇa vā prayāmi dharmāya tu niścito vanam||41||
255:115: rājovāca-atha vane tava ka āśvāsaḥ evamapratikriye mṛtyubhaye sati dharmaparigrahe ca|
255:116: kiṃ tvā vane na samupaiṣyati mṛtyuśatru-
255:117: rdharme sthitāḥ kimṛṣayo na vane vinaṣṭāḥ|
255:118: sarvatra nāma niyataḥ krama eṣa tatra
255:121: kāmaṃ sthiteṣu bhavane ca vane ca mṛtyu-
255:124: dharmaśca nāma vana eva sukha prapattum||43||
255:131: śamaikakāryaḥ parituṣṭamānasaḥ sukhaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca yaśāṃsi cārcchati||46||
255:132: dharmaśca rakṣati naraṃ na dhanaṃ balaṃ vā
255:136: kriyāviśeṣaśca yathā vyavasthitaḥ śubhasya pāpasya ca bhinnalakṣaṇaḥ|
255:137: tathā vipāko'pyaśubhasya durgatiścitrasya dharmasya sukhāśrayā gatiḥ||48||
255:138: ityanunīya sa mahātmā pitaraṃ kṛtābhyanujñaḥ pitrā tṛṇavadapāsya rājyalakṣmīṃ tapovanāśrayaṃ cakāra|
255:139: tatra ca dhyānānyapramāṇāni cotpādya teṣu ca pratiṣṭhāpya lokaṃ brahmalokamadhiroha|
255:140: tadevaṃ saṃvignamanasāṃ rājalakṣmīrapi śreyomārgaṃ nāvṛṇotīti saṃvegaparicayaḥ kāryaḥ|
255:145: evaṃ vane dharmaḥ sukhaṃ pratipattuṃ na geha ityevamapyunneyam|
